mapper.insert: insert into Plan (plan_user, plan_number, plan_priority, plan_title, plan_location, plan_deadline, plan_description, plan_category, plan_share) values (#{plan_user}, #{plan_number}, #{plan_priority}, #{plan_title}, #{plan_location}, #{plan_deadline}, #{plan_description}, #{plan_category}, #{plan_share});
mapper.select: select * from Plan order by plan_number desc
